net.floodlightcontroller.core

Interface IOFMessageWriter

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IOFConnection, IOFConnectionBackend, IOFSwitch, IOFSwitchBackend
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MockOFConnection, MockOFSwitchImpl, NullConnection, OFConnection, OFMessageDamperMockSwitch, OFSwitch

    public interface IOFMessageWriter
    An interface to describe classes that write OF messages. E.g. IOFSwitch, IOFConnection

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Collection<OFMessage> write(java.lang.Iterable<OFMessage> msgList)
      Writes the list of messages to the output stream.
      boolean write(OFMessage m)
      Writes the OFMessage to the output stream.
      <R extends OFMessage> 
      		 writeRequest( request)
      write an OpenFlow Request message, register for a single corresponding reply message or error message.
      <REPLY extends OFStatsReply> 
      		 writeStatsRequest( request)
      write a Stats (Multipart-) request, register for all corresponding reply messages.

    • Method Detail

      • write

        boolean write(OFMessage m)
        Writes the OFMessage to the output stream.
        Parameters:
        m -
        Returns:
        true upon success; false if message could not be written

      • write

        java.util.Collection<OFMessage> write(java.lang.Iterable<OFMessage> msgList)
        Writes the list of messages to the output stream. Any messages that could not be written due to channel disconnect will be returned.
        Parameters:
        msglist -
        Returns:
        list of messages that could not be written

      • writeRequest

        <R extends OFMessage>  writeRequest( request)
        write an OpenFlow Request message, register for a single corresponding reply message or error message.
        Parameters:
        request -
        Returns:
        a Future object that can be used to retrieve the asynchrounous response when available. If the connection is not currently connected, will return a Future that immediately fails with a @link{SwitchDisconnectedException}.

      • writeStatsRequest

        <REPLY extends OFStatsReply>  writeStatsRequest( request)
        write a Stats (Multipart-) request, register for all corresponding reply messages. Returns a Future object that can be used to retrieve the List of asynchronous OFStatsReply messages when it is available.
        Parameters:
        request - stats request
        Returns:
        Future object wrapping OFStatsReply If the connection is not currently connected, will return a Future that immediately fails with a @link{SwitchDisconnectedException}.
